title: Fanciful Medieval Typeface from Taschen Fairy Tales of The Brothers Grimm Book
content:
This font is from the taschen 'Fairy Tales of the Brothers Grimm' The font is used for the titles of each fairy tale.

Font: 

 Carmen Fiesta
